title: News Corp to Participate in Bank of America Merrill Lynch 2015 Media, Communications & Entertainment Conference
text:
Close 
News Corp to Participate in Bank of America Merrill Lynch 2015 Media, Communications & Entertainment Conference 
New York, NY - September 2, 2015 - News Corp announced today that Chief Financial Officer Bedi A. Singh will participate in the Bank of America Merrill Lynch 2015 Media, Communications & Entertainment Conference on Thursday, September 10, 2015, to be held in Los Angeles, CA. The session will begin at 12:00 p.m. PDT (3:00 p.m. EDT). 
To listen to a live webcast, please visit the News Corp website at http://newscorp.com/investor-relations-2/presentations/ . A replay of the webcast is expected to be available at the same location for a period of time following the conference. 
### 
About News Corp News Corporation (NASDAQ: NWS, NWSA; ASX: NWS, NWSLV) is a global, diversified media and information services company focused on creating and distributing authoritative and engaging content to consumers throughout the world. The company comprises businesses across a range of media, including: news and information services, book publishing, digital real estate services, cable network programming in Australia, digital education, and pay-TV distribution in Australia. Headquartered in New York, the activities of News Corporation are conducted primarily in the United States, Australia, and the United Kingdom. http://www.newscorp.com .
